text.1: I'm a front-end developer. My thing is designing clear, fast, and sustainable web interfaces that clearly show what you do and why people should trust you. I love taking your ideas and helping them grow, so they become stronger, clearer, and more impactful than you ever imagined.
text.2: I've already explored several fields: e-commerce, catering, CRM, SaaS... and I'm eager to dive into new experiences.
text.3: I feel at home in the JavaScript ecosystem, but I also enjoy exploring other technologies when the context requires it.
text.4: For me, every project is a unique adventure. If you want to bring an idea to life or create something new, let's talk about it!
